::Spears::

"I wasn't trying to get him killed, I was trying to get them to 
exchange him for me.  He is more important to the group. I'm no one.  
I wanted them to let him go and take me in his stead."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus looks over at Spears, "You welcome."
> 
> He frowns for a sec, remembering that it was her who was screaming 
at 
> Unitron, "Why did you scream at Unitron like that? He could'ave 
killed 
> Ramhorn."
